What is Write the Docs about?

Write the Docs brings everyone who writes the docs together in the same room: Programmers, Tech Writers, Support, Designers, Developer Advocates, and more. We all have things to learn from each other, and thereâ€™s no better way than sitting together and talking.

We invite you to join 400 other folks in a three-day event to explore the art and science of documentation.

Schedule Overview

Hike

May 5

If you're in town early, join us for the Hike. Portland has excellent access to the woods right in the city, and we'll be exploring Forest Park and the Hoyt Arboretum.

Writing Day

May 6

Join us for the Writing Day and Welcome Reception. The first official day of the conference is full of chances to interact with other documentarians.

Main Conference

May 7-8

The main days of the conference. We will be running our main track in the ballroom, and the Unconference in Lola's Room.
